member.summary: Enumerates available terrarium game modes. Currently only EcoSystem mode and Terrarium mode exist.

member.summary: EcoSystem mode where multiple peers connect over the Internet.

member.summary: Terrarium mode where a single peer operates by itself or several peers operate on a custom channel.

member.name: T:Terrarium.Forms.LedStates
member.summary: Identifies the states available in a TerrariumLed control. The led acts just like a US stoplight with values for good (green), in flux (yellow), and failed (red).

member.name: F:Terrarium.Forms.LedStates.Failed
member.summary: The LED is in a failed state and is painted red.

member.name: F:Terrarium.Forms.LedStates.Waiting
member.summary: The LED is in a waiting state and is painted yellow

member.name: F:Terrarium.Forms.LedStates.Idle
member.summary: The LED is in an idle state and is painted green.
